# OpenShred

Summary: OpenShred is an open-source data deletion assistant. It connects to Gmail, identifies data broker messages, drafts GDPR/CCPA deletion requests, and tracks responses. Requests are only sent after explicit user approval.

Primary URL: https://app.dimitroff.work
Privacy: https://app.dimitroff.work/privacy
Terms: https://app.dimitroff.work/terms
Source: https://github.com/kirilan/OpenShred

Notes: The service is free to use and provided as-is without guarantees. Users can self-host the project for maximum privacy.
